1.content: Here is your first random question so I will start off easy. How many wheels does a reliant robin have?
1.title: First question

11.content: Unlucky! But here is your consolation prize! An empty dvd case! Have fun and see you next time!
11.title: Dvd prize

choices: A guy who wears a suit and is caked in foundation
12.content: Well done! Here is your second question. Who is Jeremy Kyle?
12.title: Second question

121.content: Totally right! He may be a brittish talk show host but this is who he really is! Your next question is a redwall one (you should have seen this one coming). Who were the warriors who traveled to loamhedge to find sister armels secret for Martha Braebuck?
121.title: Redwall

1211.content: Yeah you wish! If you havent read the book it was a fair try but tough luck! Your prize is a bar of Mark Henrys sexual chocolate! Enjoy!
1211.title: Chocolate

1212.content: Different book dude! For trying your prize is a dinner date with barbara streisand. Have fun!
1212.title: Barbara

1213.content: Thats them alright! The otter and the squirrel gave their lives for the secret. Here is your next question. Who is bugs bunny's girlfriend in the movie Space Jam?
1213.title: Bugs bunny

choices: as much as a  woodchuck chuck could chuck wood
12131.content:
Im sorry, you came all this way to answer a question in an interactive game show story, a question even a dumb ass kid would get right and the sad part...you got it right!!!!

Next question:

How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck would chuck wood?
12131.title: Wood chuck

121311.content:
Congrats you won a lifetime suply of air. The thing that you need to live. If you already dont have it, then most likely you are dead.

Next question:
Какой цвет является небом большинство времени?
121311.title: Free air

1213111.content:
Either you made a very lucky guess or you know that Какой цвет является небом большинство времени? is russian for What color is the sky during the day most of the time?

Next question:
What movie had Freddy Kuger in it?
1213111.title: Blue

12131111.content: Hmm...no. You win a mystery bag, open it, and discover that it's just full of air!
12131111.title: Friday the 13th

12131112.content:
AWESOME! You are clearly a fan of horror movies and that is wonderful!

Next question:

What does MILF stand for?
12131112.title: MILF

121311121.content: Cool answer! Now answer this. Which band sounds like a cheap version of Blink 182?
121311121.title: Blink

1213111211.content: Okay then! I could say your right but that would be lying. Your consolation prize is tickets to see Pavarotti (expired 1993)! Lucky you!
1213111211.title: Pavarotti

choices: Someone who died in a car crash
1213111212.content: Absolutely correct! I hate Sum 41. See if you can answer this! Which of these died in a car crash?
1213111212.title: Crash!

12131112121.content: Your powers of deduction amaze me!!! Now who made breaking news headlines on September 20th 2006?
12131112121.title: Someone who died in a car crash

121311121212.content: Your really good at this aren't you either you read or watch the news or your a big fan of Top Gear... or it was just a lucky guess now Who is the president of england ?
121311121212.title: Richard Hammond

1213111212121.content: Correct, though he isnt doing a good job! Now answer this. How many pokemon were in the red and blue versions?
1213111212121.title: Pokemon

12131112121211.content: Unlucky! But I apologise if you havent played the games (and you really should they're exellent)! Your prize for trying is a pack of kleenex tissues. You lucky thing!
12131112121211.title: Tissues

12131112121212.content: Your right! In a way there were 151 but im not counting Mew. Next question! What was the name of the character that Jim Carey played in the film Dumb and Dumber?
12131112121212.title: Dumb and Dumber

121311121212121.content: Well its not christmas come early for you cause you chose the wrong answer! Your prize is Hannah Montanas wig! Think how much you'll get on ebay for that!
121311121212121.title: Wig

121311121212122.content: Yes absolutely correct! Now tell me what was the name of the poor supervisor in that classic brittish comedy On The Buses!
121311121212122.title: On The Buses

1213111212121221.content: The way he acts really makes me laugh. You were right by the way. This question should be easy. Complete the title of this popular kids tv show (and one I enjoy watching) Thats So...
1213111212121221.title: Blank

12131112121212211.content: Your right its Not Cool! In case you havent realised youre wrong. Your prize is an empty box!
12131112121212211.title: Box

12131112121212212.content: Yeah thats right! I love watching it its really funny! Heres another question. What is the name of the last Zelda game on Gamecube?
12131112121212212.title: Zelda

121311121212122121.content: Sorry Phantom Hourglas was on the ds. Your prize for trying is a pencil with your name on it!
121311121212122121.title: Pencil

121311121212122122.content: Correct this game was also realease for the Wii as a launch title. Now complete the name of this song by Paramore: ... Business.
121311121212122122.title: Paramore

1213111212121221221.content: Yeah I can really see that song being realeased! Thats sarcasm for you. Your prize for trying is a night out with Janet Jackson (be very afraid)!
1213111212121221221.title: Happy

1213111212121221222.content: Yep and its an awesome song (Paramore are my fave band and im in love with Hayley Williams)! Here is your next question. What animal does ham come from?
1213111212121221222.title: Ham

12131112121212212221.content: Yes thats right and apart from vegetarians who doesnt like ham. This next question is also "ham" related. Which of the following have a relationship with ham?
12131112121212212221.title: Similar

121311121212122122211.content: Okay in a way I can see how that confused you but then again it should have been obvious. Your prize is a visit from a 70 year old David Hasselhof impersinator!
121311121212122122211.title: Look-a-Like

121311121212122122212.content: Correct even though I dont know what that is! Here is your next question. What band had a duet with Corey Taylor and realeased a song called Im Not Jesus?
121311121212122122212.title: Corey Taylor

1213111212121221222121.content: No your completely wrong and this time I cant be bothered to elaborate why. Your consolation prize is a picture of the worlds fattest man (which talks). Enjoy!
1213111212121221222121.title: Trivium

1213111212121221222122.content: Good answer! I never cared much for Slipknot but Corey Taylor is awesome! Here is your next question. How many candles would be on a 6 year olds birthday cake?
1213111212121221222122.title: Birthday

12131112121212212221221.content: Maybe if you turned the number around you would have been right. It should have been obvious! Your prize is a box of laxatives, just to keep you regular!
12131112121212212221221.title: Regular

12131112121212212221222.content: I think I must be running out of ideas cause that one was easy! Im going to make them harder from now on. So here goes. What was the name of the comedy series written by Simon Pegg (star of the movie Shaun Of The Dead)?
12131112121212212221222.title: Simon Pegg

121311121212122122212221.content: Sorry but I made that up! Are you ready for a random prize? Really? Okay here it is! Are you sure your ready! Its.... Garlic bread (and if you send me £25 I will include breath mints)!
121311121212122122212221.title: Garlic

121311121212122122212222.content: Ive only recently discovered spaced and for those yet to watch it your missing out on one of the funniest sitcoms ever. Lets have another question. Which of these is NOT a place in France?
121311121212122122212222.title: France

1213111212121221222122221.content: Sorry but Toulouse is in France. I did say the questions were going to get harder! Your prize for coming this far is half a shoe! And yes, ive just gone completely insane! Viva boston!
1213111212121221222122221.title: Boston

1213111212121221222122222.content: Correct and for those who dont know, Turin is in Italy (and it is where the Italian Job took place). Here comes another question. What planet was famously demoted from planet status in August 2006 and is now considered a dwarf?
1213111212121221222122222.title: Planets

choices: Tell them a really bad joke
12131112121212212221222221.content: Yes and hopefully your finding the questions a bit harder. With this next one im gonna try something different. Which of these is something you should NOT do on your first date with your girlfriend/boyfriend?
12131112121212212221222221.title: First date

121311121212122122212222211.content: It has to happen eventually but you should never do it on your first date! Unless you want to split up of course! Next question. Who left the Jerry Springer show to host his own talk show? (the show thats like Jeremy Kyle but without the foundation. I really hate Jeremy Kyle!)
121311121212122122212222211.title: Talk show

1213111212121221222122222111.content: If you picked this then you are quite frankly stuiped. Yes you are dont try and deny it. Im sorry I really am I think your really intelligent! Thats me being sarcastic! Oh well your prize is a tin of salmon thats 3 years passed its sell by date! (that means you shouldnt eat it)
1213111212121221222122222111.title: Salmon

1213111212121221222122222112.content: Yes and never before has a talkshow had such a tough host! Did I mention that I hate Jeremy Kyle? I did? Oh well here is your next question. How many of the Dirty Sanchez guys are Welsh?
1213111212121221222122222112.title: Dirty Sanchez

12131112121212212221222221121.content:
Congratulations! THough I didn't know who they were.

Ok, so I'll make this one harder:
Would you rather get together with the most attractive man or woman in the world, or
HAVE GILLS?
12131112121212212221222221121.title: 3 of them

121311121212122122212222211211.content: As much as I think gills would be fun I think they would get boring after a while. So this is the wrong answer and your prize is a tin of magnolia paint!
121311121212122122212222211211.title: Magnolia

121311121212122122212222211212.content: Oh yes and I would give anything to go out with Hayley Williams (Paramore)! Your next question! What rugby team won the Grand Slam 2008?
121311121212122122212222211212.title: Rugby

1213111212121221222122222112121.content: Oh yes and us Welsh beat every team that came at us and hopefully we will do the same in 2009! Now answer this. What 2 animals is the character Daxter (from the playstation2 game Jak and Daxter) a mix of?
1213111212121221222122222112121.title: Daxter

12131112121212212221222221121211.content: Yes and I hope your not getting bored because I have no idea when this interactive is going to end! Here is your next question. Complete the name of this popular american tv show: Everybody Hates .....
12131112121212212221222221121211.title: Hates

121311121212122122212222211212111.content: I dont like Pickles! Anyway I guess you chose the right answer seeing as your reading this. Well arent you clever. Here is your next question. What is the name of the main character who everyone tries to avoid in the show Keeping Up Appearences?
121311121212122122212222211212111.title: Keeping up Appearences

1213111212121221222122222112121111.content: Totally right and to her keeping up appearences is everything! Now for a completely different question. What name is written on the manure truck that Biff Tannen drives into in the classic Back to the Future?
1213111212121221222122222112121111.title: Manure

12131112121212212221222221121211111.content: Yeah and thats the reason Danny Jones liked the band name McFly. Next question. If I have 5 apples and I take 3 away how many oranges do I have?
12131112121212212221222221121211111.title: Apples

121311121212122122212222211212111111.content: Yep and im glad to see you didnt fall for my little trick there. Here is your next question. On the film Waynes World what is the name of Waynes ex-girlfriend? (the crazy stalker)
121311121212122122212222211212111111.title: Wayne

1213111212121221222122222112121111111.content: Your right! Interesting fact my cousin had a girlfriend who was just like her! This is a more personal question about my taste in music. Which of these bands do I like: My Chemical Romance or Led Zepplin? Heres a clue: I really dont like emo.
1213111212121221222122222112121111111.title: Music

12131112121212212221222221121211111111.content: Ugh! I really hate MCR and it doesnt help that my brother is obsessed with them. Your prize is a role im the next generic action movie! Youll be the 23rd person to be shot!
12131112121212212221222221121211111111.title: Action

12131112121212212221222221121211111112.content: Oh yeah now theres a band that deserve all the credit they get! Based on Stairway to Heaven alone they are one of the greatest bands ever! Anyway next question. What classic cartoon was made into a film in 2008 and featured 3 unique singers?
12131112121212212221222221121211111112.title: Singing

121311121212122122212222211212111111121.content: Hmm not the smartest choice but you have a point it would be interesting to hear robots singing but like James Blunt it would get on your nerves. Your prize is a box of washing powder signed by Mr Motivator! Smell the freshness!
121311121212122122212222211212111111121.title: Powder

121311121212122122212222211212111111122.content: Yeah and they sound the same now as they did all those years ago! By the way if you answer this question correctly youll only have one more left! So good luck! Where would you find Omega3?
121311121212122122212222211212111111122.title: Omega3

1213111212121221222122222112121111111221.content: Oh so unlucky! You'd find it in fish which swim in water but not in water itself! And you were so close too! Your prize for coming this far has to be a good one and here it is! The crazy frog single! Which ive already scratched for you so you cant hear it! Arent you a lucky dude!
1213111212121221222122222112121111111221.title: Cd

1213111212121221222122222112121111111222.content: Odd but true. So here we are. The final question. Its been a long journey my friends. Theres more tension here than the Micheal Jackson courtcase! Now here is your final question. Good luck! What is the time difference between California and Great Britain?
1213111212121221222122222112121111111222.title: Time

choices: Who wants respect I want the box!
1213111212121221222122222112121111111222.content: Amazing! Youve won! You beat 40 Really Random questions! I'd pat you on the back if you could! But you have one more choice to make. What do you want for your ultimate prize? My eternal respect OR whats in this box?
1213111212121221222122222112121111111222.title: Prizes

1213111212121221222122222112121111111222.content: And you have it! Your awesome and dont let anyone tell you different! Thank you so much for playing and I hope you enjoyed yourself! Goodbye!
1213111212121221222122222112121111111222.title: Bye bye

1213111212121221222122222112121111111222.content: Okay so you chose the box over my respect! Well lets hope its a good prize (sound of the box opening). Well that is suprising! Its a picture of that wierd old woman who lives up the road from you in a bikini! Wow and look at that moustache! Are you sure youve won? Cause I think youve lost! HAHAHAHAHA!
1213111212121221222122222112121111111222.title: Goodbye

1213111212121221222122222112121111111222.content: No! And you were this close to the ultimate prize! I probably should have mentioned that it was an all or nothing question so your runner up prize is absolutely nothing! Emptiness! Thinair! Thanks for playing!
1213111212121221222122222112121111111222.title: Close

1213111212121221222122222112121111112.content: If you picked this because you havent watched the film then you must be one of the few people who havent seen it. I advise you to see it though, its brilliant! Your prize is a a half eaten ham sandwich. The guy who ate the half is a mafia hitman called Big Toni and he wants the other half! Be careful. I wouldnt eat it if I were you!
1213111212121221222122222112121111112.title: Big Toni

121311121212122122212222211212111112.content: It was kind of a trick question so im not suprised that youve got it wrong! Your prize for getting tricked is a roof tile picked from my lucky hat which is very big and heavy!
121311121212122122212222211212111112.title: Tile

12131112121212212221222221121211112.content: Nope and I hope my cousin isnt reading this because thats his name. Okay now what to give you... I know! A dinner date with Mr T! I pity the fool! Cause the fool is you!
12131112121212212221222221121211112.title: Mr T

1213111212121221222122222112121112.content: Even though she sounds like someone you should avoid its wrong! See you should have avoided this choice and chose the other. Oh well your prize is a trip to Stoke-On-Trent! Bon Voyage!
1213111212121221222122222112121112.title: Stoke

121311121212122122212222211212112.content: No the right answer would have been Everybody LOVES Raymond! LOVES! You know the one. Anyway your prize is a tube of Simon Cowells teeth whitener! His teeth glow and now yours can too!
121311121212122122212222211212112.title: Cowell

12131112121212212221222221121212.content: If it was the right answer it would be right but your wrong. A ferret and a squirrel mixed though, I wonder what that would look like. Anyway your random prize is canoeing with Ellen Degenerous! Be very careful!
12131112121212212221222221121212.title: Canoe

1213111212121221222122222112122.content: Nope and as im Welsh I couldnt have asked for a better result! Sorry if your English and your reading this but thats the way it is! Your prize for coming this far and failing is a bottle of flat coca cola!
1213111212121221222122222112122.title: Cola

12131112121212212221222221122.content: Completely wrong! Maybe this time I shouldnt give a random prize and let you be miserable for the rest of your life. But that would be evil. So your prize is jury duty. Hahahaha! (Thats me laughing evilly!)
12131112121212212221222221122.title: Jury

121311121212122122212222212.content: As bad as it sounds it shouldnt end your relationship (unless its really bad). So thats that then. Your consolation prize is a half eaten bag of salt and vinegar crisps! Now at least you wont get hungry!
121311121212122122212222212.title: Joking

12131112121212212221222222.content: If you had gone further into space you may have found your answer but as luck would have it your wrong. Your prize is a visit from the Teletubbies! Do me a favour and kill them all when they show up that way you'll get more enjoyment too! Everybody wins!
12131112121212212221222222.title: Teletubbies

12131112121212212222.content: Moo! Does that sound like a pig to you? Well you lost! Your prize is a trip to a laundretts! At least your clothes will be clean now!
12131112121212212222.title: Moo

1213111212121222.content: It really should have been obvious from the name. Oh well here is your consolation prize, Noel Edmonds beard!
1213111212121222.title: Edmonds

1213111212122.content: Maybe some time ago he was but not now. Your consolation prize is a pot of jam! Tony Blair did have big ears though didnt he!
1213111212122.title: Mr Blair

12131112122.content:
You are either really stupid or don't know stuff because everyone knows elvis died taking to many drugs. Your prize is a journey on the cruise ship Titanic enjoy it...
small print: it will be your last one *laughs evily*
12131112122.title: Elvis Presely

121311122.content: Your wrong! I wasnt sure about keeping that question but I thought as its censored its alright. Your random prize is an Elvis Presely wig!
121311122.title: Presely

1213112.content: Man if you dont know that the sky is most of the time blue during the day then you are dumb...or dont know how to read in Russian.
1213112.title: Dont be so green

121312.content: Sorry but you are WRONG!!!
121312.title: nope

12132.content: So close but so far from the truth
12132.title: WRONG!

choices: He didn't get tickets to see Jackie Chan.
He was chasing the chicken or running away from this interactive.
12133.content: So why did the gopher cross the road?
12133.title: Jackie Chan

121331.content:
Is that your final answer? You suuuuuure? I guess if it could be right, it's probably right. Right?

Next question: So, when it gets right down to it and you're the only one up and left who isn't
worn down, and it's left up to you to do what's right, and left isn't right, would right
be left if down is left right up there?
121331.title: Right? Right!

122.content: Actually your right he is but your still wrong. Why you ask. Its because he is crap at his job. But for a good guess your prize is a trip in a landrover with micheal barrymore.
122.title: Barrymore

123.content: Are you insane?! You must be! Oh well your wrong your consolation prize is a plate of tripe! Lucky you!
123.title: Mother!?

13.content: So close yet so far! Your consolation prize is giving a sponge bath to a granny at an old folks home
13.title: Granny

info.brief_description: 40 random questions! Can you answer them all?
info.description: 40 random questions are waiting to see if you can answer them. Can you answer them all the first time around and win the ultimate prize? Good luck!
